titles.title: CB 419 My Song Shall Be Of Jesus

properties.copyright: 1997 Sonlight Songs, Administered by Roberts, Frank E.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
B
My song shall be of Jesus
His mercies crown my days
He fills my cup with blessings
And tunes my heart to praise

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
My song shall be of Jesus
The precious Lamb of God
Who gave Himself a ransom
And bought me with His blood

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
My song shall be of Jesus
When sitting at His feet
I call to mind His goodness
In meditation sweet

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
My song shall be of Jesus
Whatever ill betide
I'll sing the grace that saves me
And keeps me at His side

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
My song shall be of Jesus
While pressing on my way
To reach the blissful region
Of pure and perfect day

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
And when my soul shall enter
The gate of heaven fair
A song of praise to Jesus
I'll sing forever there
